name: DatepickerMod
description: The Datepicker Custom Widget provides a sophisticated input field for date values and date ranges. The date formatting is customizable and a dark mode is provided.

getDateVal.description: get the date. (start date if range selection is enabled)

setDateVal.description: set the date. (start date if range selection is enabled)

getSecondDateVal.description: get the end date. (returns undefined if range selection is not enabled)
getSecondDateVal.body: var x = new Date(); x = undefined; if (this.enablerange) { return this.secondDateVal; } else { return x; }

setSecondDateVal.description: set the end date. (has no effect if range selection is not enabled)

isRangeEnabled.description: Returns whether range selection is enabled

onChange.description: Called when the user changes the selected date.
